item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][tt_wrap bg_color="#ffffff" ratio="0.6" id="intro"][vc_row_inner el_class="text-center"][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Hello

Revera is a small studio based in Manhattan. We help you to get your stoury out there and be remembered. View our recent work and feel free to get in touch.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/tt_wrap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][tt_wrap bg_color="#f5f5f5" ratio="0.6" id="services"][tt_title big_sub="This is what we do" align="center" small_sub="And we simply love it"]Services[/tt_title][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Branding" icon="bold" button_text="More About Branding" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" target="_self" icon_pos="top"]mage is everything. A good product needs the right branding. We make sure your future clients will recognize your work from miles away.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Design" icon="cut" button_text="Experience More" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" target="_self" icon_pos="top"]We can do very cool stuff with paper & scissors. This is a placeholder text for this service. It's just to give you an idea of how the stuff will look like.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Strategy" icon="bomb" button_text="More Explosive Stuff" target="_self" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" icon_pos="top"]Some people use well thought strategies. We just drop bombs. Just kidding. Our strategy works and your amount of sales will explode someday.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="60px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Illustrations" icon="pencil" button_text="Let's Draw Something" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" target="_self" icon_pos="top"]If you need some cool illustrations for your upcoming book or you want to fancy up your new webdesign, our illustrators can do it all.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Photography" icon="camera-retro" button_text="Let's Shoot Some Pictures" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" target="_self" icon_pos="top"]If stock images don't seem to do the job, why not use authentic ones? We'll make sure every pixel will look crisp and at its best.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Video" icon="youtube-play" button_text="3. 2. 1. Action!" target="_self" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" icon_pos="top"]Wanna be famous on the tube? Or need a cool introduction for your website? Our own Spielbergs are ready for some cinema quality stuff.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/tt_wrap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][tt_wrap bg_color="#ffffff" ratio="0.6" id="process"][tt_title big_sub="We love it when a plan comes together" small_sub="Basically this is just how we handle stuff" align="center"]Process[/tt_title][tt_process id="process1" width="six"][tt_process_item number="1" title="Connect" icon="comments-o"]First things first: Let's connect! We'd like to hear your story and the ideas you have for your project.[/tt_process_item][tt_process_item number="2" title="Design" icon="cut"]After we talked about your ideas, it's time to translate the concept into a cutting edge design.[/tt_process_item][tt_process_item number="3" title="Build" icon="cubes"]If we're all in love with the design, we're going to build everything so the stuff is actually working.[/tt_process_item][tt_process_item number="4" title="Launch" icon="send"]When everything is working like a fast (paper) plane, it's time to launch and tell everyone about the project we made.[/tt_process_item][tt_process_item number="5" title="Keep it up" icon="child"]After everything is up and running, we make sure it's going to keep running nice, smooth & fast.[/tt_process_item][/tt_process][/tt_wrap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][tt_divider color="#eeeeee"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" el_class="text-center"][tt_wrap bg_color="#ffffff" ratio="0.6" id="work"][tt_title big_sub="This is what we've made recently" small_sub="Created with pixels & passion" align="center"]work[/tt_title][tt_portfolio columns="3" items="6" orderby="date" order="DESC"][tt_button text="More Projects" style="outlined" button_default_color="black" align="center" target="_self" url="#"][/tt_wrap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" el_class="text-center"][tt_wrap bg_color="#f5f5f5" image="24" parallax="yes" ratio="0" id="para1"][vc_column_text]

A new design today for better results tomorrow

Get in touch & see if we're a good match!

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="35px"][tt_button text="Connect with us" style="outlined" button_default_color="white" align="center" target="_self"][tt_button text="Get Revera Now" style="solid" button_default_color="color" align="center" target="_self" url="#"][/tt_wrap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][tt_wrap bg_color="#ffffff" ratio="0.6" id="about"][tt_title big_sub="We're a bunch of creative people" small_sub="Sometimes weird but we're always friendly" align="center"]About[/tt_title][tt_slider images="99,100,101" mode="fade" speed="500" pause="4000" controls="1" auto="1"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Thanks for visiting our habitat! We're friendly people who love to spend time creating and developing new concepts to make the world a little bit better.

If you'd like to visit us to take a look in our studio, just get in touch. We'll make sure the coffee (or tea) is hot and the soda's are fresh!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/tt_wrap][tt_members][tt_members_item name="Jake Rogers" role="CEO & Founder" image="107" facebook="#" email="jake@revera.com"]Jake is the guy who started Revera. He can design websites while driving his Vespa scooter and he once climbed the Mount Everest with his dog Sparky.[/tt_members_item][tt_members_item name="Eva Monroe" role="Designer" image="108" email="eva@revera.com" twitter="#"]Our top notch artist is Eva. While not designing, she likes to cook and cycling around the lake. Eva also likes to watch thrillers and comedies.[/tt_members_item][tt_members_item name="Barry Stripe" role="Developer" image="109" linkedin="#" dribbble="#"]Barry is the one who turns static pixels into life with his coding skills. He loves to play pool and driving his '68 Buick Riviera in the weekends.[/tt_members_item][tt_members_item name="Mimi Dodgers" role="Video & Photographer" image="110" google_plus="#" skype="#"]Shooting video's and photo's is what Mimi does best. While she's not working with camera's and lenses, she's probably running or playing soccer.[/tt_members_item][tt_members_item name="Sparky" role="Security Guard" image="111" flickr="#" instagram="#"]This is Sparky. Our 7 year old in-house guard. He's the one who barks when our clients don't want to pay. Just kidding, he's a good dog.[/tt_members_item][/tt_members][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_empty_space height="100px"][tt_divider color="#eeeeee"][vc_empty_space height="100px"][tt_testimonial width="eight"][tt_testimonial_item name="R. Moore" role="- CEO of Company Inc" image="119"]The awesome team of Revera helped us creating an amazing website for our company. We recieve compliments all the time![/tt_testimonial_item][tt_testimonial_item name="M. Moneypenny" role=" - Supervisor of Company Inc" image="120"]If you ever need a refreshing idea, go to Revera. I don't know how they do it, it must be the tea they're drinking.[/tt_testimonial_item][tt_testimonial_item name="Ron Burgundy" role=" - Designer at Sooper Studio's" image="121"]The good times are for those who take action. Revera is a simple and easy to use template for creative people.[/tt_testimonial_item][/tt_testimonial][vc_empty_space height="100px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

While she's not working with camera's and lenses, she's probably running or playing soccer.[/tt_members_item][tt_members_item name="Sparky" role="Security Guard" image="111" flickr="#" instagram="#"]This is Sparky. Our 7 year old in-house guard. He's the one who barks when our clients don't want to pay. Just kidding, he's a good dog.[/tt_members_item][/tt_members][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_empty_space height="100px"][tt_divider color="#eeeeee"][vc_empty_space height="100px"][tt_testimonial width="eight"][tt_testimonial_item name="R. Moore" role="- CEO of Company Inc" image="119"]The awesome team of Revera helped us creating an amazing website for our company. We recieve compliments all the time![/tt_testimonial_item][tt_testimonial_item name="M. Moneypenny" role=" - Supervisor of Company Inc" image="120"]If you ever need a refreshing idea, go to Revera. I don't know how they do it, it must be the tea they're drinking.[/tt_testimonial_item][tt_testimonial_item name="Ron Burgundy" role=" - Designer at Sooper Studio's" image="121"]The good times are for those who take action. Revera is a simple and easy to use template for creative people.[/tt_testimonial_item][/tt_testimonial][vc_empty_space height="100px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Video Auto Play
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][tt_wrap bg_color="#ffffff" ratio="0.6" id="intro"][vc_row_inner el_class="text-center"][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Hello

Revera is a small studio based in Manhattan. We help you to get your stoury out there and be remembered. View our recent work and feel free to get in touch.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/tt_wrap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][tt_wrap bg_color="#f5f5f5" ratio="0.6" id="services"][tt_title big_sub="This is what we do" align="center" small_sub="And we simply love it"]Services[/tt_title][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Branding" icon="bold" button_text="More About Branding" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" target="_self" icon_pos="top"]mage is everything. A good product needs the right branding. We make sure your future clients will recognize your work from miles away.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Design" icon="cut" button_text="Experience More" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" target="_self" icon_pos="top"]We can do very cool stuff with paper & scissors. This is a placeholder text for this service. It's just to give you an idea of how the stuff will look like.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Strategy" icon="bomb" button_text="More Explosive Stuff" target="_self" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" icon_pos="top"]Some people use well thought strategies. We just drop bombs. Just kidding. Our strategy works and your amount of sales will explode someday.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height="60px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Illustrations" icon="pencil" button_text="Let's Draw Something" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" target="_self" icon_pos="top"]If you need some cool illustrations for your upcoming book or you want to fancy up your new webdesign, our illustrators can do it all.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Photography" icon="camera-retro" button_text="Let's Shoot Some Pictures" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" target="_self" icon_pos="top"]If stock images don't seem to do the job, why not use authentic ones? We'll make sure every pixel will look crisp and at its best.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][tt_service title="Video" icon="youtube-play" button_text="3. 2. 1. Action!" target="_self" url="http://demo.themetor.com/revera/services/" icon_pos="top"]Wanna be famous on the tube? Or need a cool introduction for your website? Our own Spielbergs are ready for some cinema quality stuff.[/tt_service][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/tt_wrap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][tt_wrap bg_color="#ffffff" ratio="0.6" id="process"][tt_title big_sub="We love it when a plan comes together" small_sub="Basically this is just how we handle stuff" align="center"]Process[/tt_title][tt_process id="process1" width="six"][tt_process_item number="1" title="Connect" icon="comments-o"]First things first: Let's connect! We'd like to hear your story and the ideas you have for your project.[/tt_process_item][tt_process_item number="2" title="Design" icon="cut"]After we talked about your ideas, it's time to translate the concept into a cutting edge design.[/tt_process_item][tt_process_item number="3" title="Build" icon="cubes"]If we're all in love with the design, we're going to build everything so the stuff is actually working.[/tt_process_item][tt_process_item number="4" title="Launch" icon="send"]When everything is working like a fast (paper) plane, it's time to launch and tell everyone about the project we made.[/tt_process_item][tt_process_item number="5" title="Keep it up" icon="child"]After everything is up and running, we make sure it's going to keep running nice, smooth & fast.[/tt_process_item][/tt_process][/tt_wrap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][tt_divider color="#eeeeee"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" el_class="text-center"][tt_wrap bg_color="#ffffff" ratio="0.6" id="work"][tt_title big_sub="This is what we've made recently" small_sub="Created with pixels & passion" align="center"]work[/tt_title][tt_portfolio columns="3" items="6" orderby="date" order="DESC"][tt_button text="More Projects" style="outlined" button_default_color="black" align="center" target="_self" url="#"][/tt_wrap][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1" el_class="text-center"][tt_wrap bg_color="#f5f5f5" image="24" parallax="yes" ratio="0" id="para1"][vc_column_text]

A new design today for better results tomorrow

Get in touch & see if we're a good match!

If you'd like to visit us to take a look in our studio, just get in touch. We'll make sure the coffee (or tea) is hot and the soda's are fresh!
